cause.description:
Proceeds will be donated to Muscular Dystrophy fund to help MDA kids and patients will medical bills, camps,research and other beneficial things. On Wednesday, June 13 at 3:00 pm at Cheesburger in Paradise, bring yourself and any contributions you can afford even two or three dollars, to help free Kate and Megan from prison. Kate and I need to raise $1,800. We desperatly need help from anyone, and the contributions are tax deductable. Unfortunently, only Kate will be attending the event and representing both of us; I will be on a flight to Washington, D.C. If you would like to make a contribution but cannot attend the event please let me know and I will be more than willing to pick it up. Thanks!!
1. Megan and Kate "MOST WANTED"
2. DESCRIPTION: Usually wears a smile
3. CAUTION: Heavily armed with kindness
4. PRIOR CONVICTION: Thoughtfulness and Generosity
5. MEGAN & KATE > PARIS HILTON
cause.mission: Post Bail for Megan and Kate Emmert!!!
cause.name: MDA: Muscular Dystrophy Association
